mapper.select: select dog_no, dog_name, dog_breed, to_char(dog_birthday, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "DOG_BIRTHDAY" from member_dog where member_no=#{memberNo} order by dog_leader desc
select product_no, product_name, product_price, product_img, category from product where product_no in (select product_no from wishlist where member_no=#{member_no})
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where product_no=#{productNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select product_name from order_detail where order_no = #{orderNo} and rownum = 1

select order_no, target_name, order_addr, order_addr2, target_phone, order_req, order_price, order_point, order_status, to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "order_date" from orders where order_no = #{orderNo}
